img_summary: The image depicts Flame Ore, an uncommon ingredient in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item is found in the Flaming Mountains by defeating Flamlings or can be purchased from the Shrine Store. It is part of a series of ingredients and formulas used within the game's narrative, contributing to the player's ability to craft or purchase items that aid in their journey.
